dt: {bc}of, relating to, or characterized by {d_link|solipsism|solipsism} or extreme egocentricity

dt.t: The new punks can only rant about {wi}solipsistic{/wi} concerns: themselves, their friends and girlfriends, and us, the people they think look at them funny.
Played by a ferocious cast of nonactors, the dead-end adolescent rebels in Kids are like a wolf pack of baby sociopaths, leaping from one {wi}solipsistic{/wi} sensation to the next.

utxt.t: What we say to ourselves is often quite similar to what we say to each other, because we {wi}solipsistically{/wi} forget that we are in fact speaking to someone else.

shortdef: of, relating to, or characterized by solipsism or extreme egocentricity
